event: Battle of Marathon - Athens defeats Persian invasion
commit_message: Feature: Athenian military victory establishes confidence in democratic system

event: Second Persian War - Greek victory at Salamis and Plataea
commit_message: Major release: Greek alliance defeats massive Persian invasion

event: Formation of Delian League under Athenian leadership
commit_message: Feature: Establishment of maritime confederation for mutual defense

event: Age of Pericles - Athenian Golden Age
commit_message: Release: Peak period of Athenian democracy, culture, and building program

event: Construction begins on Parthenon under Pericles
commit_message: Build: Construction of the Parthenon begins on the Acropolis

event: Peloponnesian War between Athens and Sparta
commit_message: Bug fix: Internal Greek conflict weakens all city-states

event: Death of Pericles from plague during Peloponnesian War
commit_message: Critical: Loss of leadership causes political instability
Breaking change: Execution of philosopher highlights tensions in society

event: Plato founds the Academy in Athens
commit_message: Feature: First European institution of higher learning established

event: Philip II becomes king of Macedon
commit_message: Security update: Rise of Macedonian power threatens Greek independence

event: Battle of Chaeronea - Philip II defeats Athens and Thebes
commit_message: End of life: Greek city-states lose independence to Macedonia

event: Death of Alexander the Great, end of Classical period
commit_message: Fork: Classical Greece transitions to Hellenistic period
